text: This chapter shall not apply to any cosmetic unless the cosmetic is a drug as defined by § 201 of the Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 33-1015.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-137, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 48-701.

References in Text

Section 201 of the Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act is codified at 21 U.S.C. § 321.

Editor's Notes

The reference to "§ 201 of the Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act" was corrected from "§ 321 of the Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act" as it appeared in D.C. Law 8-137.

DC CODE § 48-715

Current through December 11, 2012

chapter.text: Drug Manufacture and Distribution Licensure. (Refs & Annos)
